text: Muhminkale! Yutarkalaiyum, kiristavarkalaiyum unkalutaiya patukavalarkalaka akkik kollatirkal. (Unkalukku virotam ceyvatil) avarkal tam'mil cilar cilarukkup patukavalarkalaka irukkinranar. Unkalil evarenum avarkalaip patukavalarkalaka akkinal niccayamaka avarum avarkalaic cerntavartan. Niccayamaka allah aniyayakkara makkalukku nervali kattamattan
